sentences.cn: 艾美兴高采烈地叽叽喳喳说个不停,汤姆感到无法忍受.

sentences.en: And after all, dear, what is idle prattle for?
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 亲爱的, 唠唠叨叨有什么用?

sentences.en: Don't prattle about your theory. You must practise it and prove it.
sentences.cn: 不要空谈你的理论, 你必须去实践它并检验它.

sentences.en: Don't prattle with this woman, he cautioned himself.
sentences.cn: 跟女的少那么饶舌, 他训了自己一句.

sentences.en: Enough. You prattle on like a child reciting bits of meaningless trivialities.
sentences.cn: 够了. 你就像个小孩在背诵无聊的琐事.

sentences.en: Flowing water and green grass witness your lover's endless prattle.
sentences.cn: 流水缠绕,小草依依,都是你诉不尽的情话.

sentences.en: Just be sure not to prattle on.
Lou prattled on about various trivialities till I wanted to scream.
sentences.cn: 卢就各种琐碎小事唠叨个没完，一直到我烦得都想尖叫了。

sentences.en: Seined Senator Kennedy's tome tumor is in the left prattle parietal lobe of the brain.
sentences.cn: 肯尼迪议员的瘤在大脑左颅顶部.

sentences.en: That is way I prattle and chatter lightly and hide my heart behind words.
sentences.cn: 因此我轻松地说东道西,把我的心藏在语言的后面.

sentences.en: That is whu I prattle and chatter lightly and hide my heart behind words.
sentences.cn: 因此我轻松地说东道西,把我的心藏在语言后面.

sentences.en: That is why I prattle and chatter lightly and hide my heat behind words.
sentences.cn: 因此我轻松的说东道西,把我的心藏在语言的后面.

sentences.en: We prattle about scientific discoveries, but we have made scant use of them for our benefit.
sentences.cn: 科学的新发现我们谈了不少, 但怎样利用它们为我们服务却做得很不够.

sentences.en: You really shouldn't prattle on about something so trivial.
sentences.cn: 别为了一点小事就叨唠.

words.tran_cn: 空谈者，闲扯的人；说半截话的人；饶舌的人

trans.tran_cn: 说孩子气的话, 说半截话, 闲聊, 胡说, 唠叨
（小孩般）天真无邪地说话，发出连续而无意义的声音，闲扯，东拉西扯
